suite.name: Testcase 9.1

test.name: Zobrazení konkrétního článku

kw.name: Open Browser And Go To Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by locator.

kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Location Should Contain
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

Location should have contained 'http://www.itnetwork.cz/java/zaklady/java-tutorial-uvod-do-jazyka-java' but it was 'https://www.itnetwork.cz/java/zaklady/java-tutorial-uvod-do-jazyka-java'.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.status: Location should have contained 'http://www.itnetwork.cz/java/zaklady/java-tutorial-uvod-do-jazyka-java' but it was 'https://www.itnetwork.cz/java/zaklady/java-tutorial-uvod-do-jazyka-java'.

suite.doc: Cílem tohoto testu je ověřit, zda se správně zobrazí konkrétní požadovaný článek.
